about.details:
DMR is engaged in providing engineering consultancy and due diligence services to hydropower, dams, roads, and railway tunnels. The services offered by the company include the entire life cycle of projects covering design & engineering, due diligence & regulatory, bid management & construction engineering, and quality & inspection. Other serving sectors of the company are renewables, water resources, mining, and urban infrastructure.

The company has a presence across 11 states in India. Internationally the company provides services to over 5 countries including Nepal, Nigeria, Dubai, Germany, and Senegal.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Presence in both domestic and international markets
  • A wide offering of engineering consultancy and due diligence services
  • Experienced management and dedicated employee base
  • Catering to diversified sectors
  • Accredited with various quality certificates

faqs.question: What is the DMR SME IPO?
faqs.answer:
DMR SME IPO is a SME IPO of 996000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.09 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹21 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on November 24, 2021, and closes on November 29, 2021.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in DMR SME IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in DMR SME IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in DMR SME IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in DMR SME IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'DMR SME IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When DMR SME IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The DMR SME IPO opens on November 24, 2021 and closes on November 29, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of DMR SME IPO?
faqs.answer: DMR SME IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for DMR SME IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in DMR SME IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is DMR SME IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for DMR SME IPO will be done on Thursday, December 2, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, December 3, 2021. Check the DMR SME IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is DMR SME IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The DMR SME IPO listing date is on Tuesday, December 7, 2021.
